# v-button-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                   | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | A label to use for the button group's `aria-label` attribute. | `string` | `''`    |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                       |
| ---- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | One or more `<v-button>` elements to display in the button group. |


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description                   |
| -------- | ----------------------------- |
| `"base"` | The component's base wrapper. |
